pages.text: $(li)The Ender Chest is a a variant of the common $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/chest)Chest$(/l).$(br)$(li)It contains an inventory exlusive only for you.
$(li)If other person try opens it, it will show them own exclusive inventory.

$(li)To use the Ender Chest, first you need to place it.$(br)$(li)Then, right click on it you can access to a new inventory.$(br)$(li)Once placed, they can only be obtained with a pickaxe with $(l:patchouli:enchanting/vanilla/silk_touch)Silk Touch$(/l) enchant.$(br)$(li)If you try to mine the Ender Chest with a pickaxe that does not have this enchant, it will break.

$(li)$(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/sack)Sacks$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/shulker_box)Shulker Boxes$(/l) can be saved in the interior of the Ender Chest$(br)$(li)This is very useful to increase the capacity of inventary that you can carry on.
